short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helpful SEO extension for Chrome with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plixu AI SEO Helper is your all-in-one tool for optimizing website SEO performance. Whether you’re analyzing on-page SEO, checking for broken links, or checking images, Plixus AI makes it easy to ensure your website is in top shape. 

Why Choose Plixu AI SEO Helper?

- Comprehensive Website Scanning: Get detailed reports on on-page SEO, broken links, image optimization, and more.
- AI-Driven Insights: Our AI scans your website to provide actionable recommendations and streamline your SEO strategy.
- Completely Free: Access all of Plixu’s powerful features without any cost or account.
- Easy to Use: Intuitive interface designed for both beginners and SEO experts.

Your Privacy Matters

Plixu AI SEO Helper is designed with your privacy in mind. We do not store, track, or keep any information from the websites you scan.

We’re always looking for ways to make Plixu even better! Got an idea or a feature you’d love to see? please email us at contact@plixu.com.
